Projects

Below are visualization projects I have been working on by chronological order.

Spatial-Constraint Model

We proposed a spatial constraint model for activating static visualization.

Paper Demo Video
SmartCube

We proposed an adaptive data management architecture for the real-time visualization of spatiotemporal datasets

Paper
DNN-VolVis

We proposed a deep learning-based volume rendering pipeline.

Paper
AutoCaption

We designed and trained deep learning models to generate short descriptions for SVG-formatted charts automatically.

Paper Poster
Asteroid Visualization

We designed a visual analytics system for analyzing the impact of different asteroids.

Paper Video
Best Viewpoint

We designed a deep learning-based method for volume rendering best view selection.

Paper
AutoTitle

We proposed a semi-automatic method for title generation.

Paper
Old Visualization

OldVisOnline is a collection of old visualizations published before 1950. We have been studying a variety of usage scenarios of OldVisOnline.

Paper Demo
